sections.heading: 60 and 61 of this act apply only to the homestead and are cumulative and in addition to any such procedures now provided or permissible under existing statutes
sections.text: Added by Laws 1959, p. 223, ยง 3. Amended by Laws 1988, c. 329, ยง 62, eff. Dec. 1, 1988. Renumbered from Title 58, ยง 858 by Laws 1988, c. 329
